ValidationRule.description: Ensures the P&C Quote Result field is populated prior to moving Oppty to Sold or better
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Permission.P_C_Quote_Data_Access, Probability >= 0.70, ISBLANK( TEXT(P_C_Quote_Result__c) ), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), OR(AND(RecordType.Name='Core Opportunity Record Type', OR( ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "Payroll"), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "Payroll-HR Pro") )), AND(RecordType.Name='Core Virtual Sales', OR( ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "Payroll"), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "Payroll-HR Pro") )), AND( RecordType.Name='MMS Opportunity Record Type', OR( ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "Payroll"), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "Payroll-HR Pro") ), OR( $User.District__c = "402", $User.District__c = "448" ) ), AND( RecordType.Name='PC Opportunity Record Type', OR(ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "Workers Comp"), ISPICKVAL(OpportunityType__c, "BOP (Business Owners Package)") ), ISBLANK(Tarmika_Quote__c)) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must populate the PC Quote Result field before marking your Opportunity as Verbal Commit or higher.
